Hi, I'm Juan Hernandez

Software Engineer | Learning Data Science

Currently completing a dual degree in Computer Engineering and Business Administration (ADE), with several projects developed to learn new technologies on my own and strengthen others. I have a strong command of English (B2 Cambridge) and am deeply interested in the world of Data. Eager to learn and grow in this field, I am focused on developing my skills and expertise in Data while continuing to build high-quality, innovative digital solutions.

View Projects Contact Me
About Me

< About Me />

I have recently completed my studies at the University of Granada (UGR), where I gained a solid foundation in both Computer Engineering and Business Administration (Double Degree). Throughout my academic journey, I developed a strong passion for technology and a proactive mindset that drives me to constantly learn and adapt to new challenges.

I am particularly passionate about exploring new technologies and have gained significant experience in Artificial Intelligence tools, which significantly boost my productivity and problem-solving capabilities. I believe in leveraging these tools to optimize processes and create innovative solutions.

I am currently seeking career opportunities in a company as a Software Engineer, Data Analyst, Data Scientist, or Data Engineer. My goal is to develop a promising professional career where I can contribute with my knowledge and skills, while also continuously growing and expanding my expertise in the ever-evolving field of technology.

I am excited about the opportunity to work with a dynamic and forward-thinking team, where I can apply my skills and contribute to meaningful projects.
